name: GitRelease
description: Generate a release in git updating the version in the package.json file and changelog.md using semantic versioning with the cli projex
author: MaikRestrepo

inputs.name: devBranch
inputs.label: Branch to integrate the changes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Pass the branch to integrate the changes automatically, by default is develop

inputs.name: beta
inputs.label: Create a beta release
inputs.helpMarkDown: Pass true to create a beta release, by default is false

inputs.name: mergeIntoDevelop
inputs.label: Merge the release into the develop branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Create a pull request to merge the changes into the develop passed branch automatically, by default is true, this only works if the beta option is true
